task.title: Select by Set or Class
task.shortdesc: Select nodes by Set or Class using the Commands Tab.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Click on a Set or Class type to select contents.
Then, click on a Verb to execute action.

ul.li: Actions can be performed on multiple Sets or Classes. Select as many as needed before executing the action by clicking a Verb.

taskbody.result:
The drawer will turn a darker shade and the name of the Set or Class type will appear under the Current Command.
If a Class type was selected, the Edge types associated with that Class will appear as drawers in the Edges of Selected Nodes bin.
taskbody.postreq:
Set or Class types in a Selected state will remain so until either:
The drawer of the Set or Class type is clicked a second time to Deselect it.
The nodes are Discarded.
